user_pwd = #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
header_pic = #{headerPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
